Question: Puricraft srl CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Puricraft Srl

Product: B-ION Boost 2001

- Awarded the Good Design® Award 2023 for Household category
- Portable battery-operated device that reduces air pollution and airborne pathogens, providing the effectiveness of an FFP2 mask
- Utilizes plasma technology for electronic air sanitization
- Designed for use in cinemas, hospitals, hotels, and other facilities
- Ionizers available on Amazon
- Recognized for product design at the BIG SEE Product Design Awards 2023
- CEO anticipates future product developments for widespread water sanitization
- Collaboration with University of Naples Federico II for health preservation in medical facilities and water sanitation
- Exhibited at CES 2024 Venetian Expo, Level 1, Hall G, EUREKA PARK booth 62000/62201
- Website: www.puricraft.com
